Item.method_code:
If Me.GetType() <> "Requirement" Then Return Me.newInnovator().newError("Item of type Requirement required") End If
Dim reqId As String = Me.getID() If reqId.Length <> 32 Then Return Me.newInnovator().newError("Requirement ID not specified") End If
Dim callframe As Item = Me.newItem("SQL", "SQL PROCESS") callframe.setProperty("name", "RequirementGetCompleteStructure") callframe.setProperty("PROCESS", "CALL") callframe.setProperty("ARG1", reqId)
Dim res As Item = callframe.apply()
Return res
Item.name: RequirementGetStructure
